name: warm & fluffy
description:
Come on in. You must be exhausted. Why not take a moment to just relax?

Just a few cozy moments with someone you love. Breathe. Remember the good things in this world. Just... relax for a moment. You probably need it.
(Note that links don't change color on being visited- The game doesn't measure completion, so tracking what you've done doesn't matter here.)
